git基本使用

github usage

Posted by yangzhl on October 26, 2016

Recently by the same author:

jekyll 搭建github个人网站

record something when I use jekyll to set up my blog

Posted by yangzhl on October 28, 2016

Jekyll Bug Github
  • git 克隆仓库（默认是master）

git clone githup_path/https_path

guthub_path是指github路径，或者https的路径

  • git clone branch

git clone -b mybranch --single-branch git://sub.domain.com/repo.git mybranch 是指github的branch(分支)的名字 git://sub.domain.com/repo.git是指github克隆的路径

  • git ssh 远程登录
